Member Function Documentation

const boost::shared_ptr<object> x2d::config::object_cfg::create (  )  [inline]

Create a new object and return a shared_ptr containing it. Note: internally, x2d will look for a user type binding under the given config key and if found it will instantiate a custom user type instead of the generic object type.

template<typename T >
